meaning: interchange, period, change, convert, replace, renew

onyomiExamples.meaning: realization (of goods into money), conversion (into money), liquidation

kunyomiExamples.meaning: to replace, to exchange, to interchange, to substitute
to succeed, to relieve, to replace, to take the place of, to substitute for, to take over for, to represent, to hand over (telephone), to be exchanged, to change (places with), to switch
